SELECT SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PLANNER(PLANNER_NO, PLANNER_WRITER, PLANNER_TITLE, F_DATE, L_DATE, W_DATE,AREA, TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME) VALUES ( #{plannerNo}, #{plannerWriter}, #{plannerTitle}, #{fDate}, #{lDate}, #{wDate}, #{area}, #{type}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )

INSERT INTO PLAN (PLAN_NO, REF_PNO, PLAN_ORDER, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_ADDRESS, X_COORDINATE, Y_COORDINATE, TRIP_DATE, MEMO) SELECT SEQ_PLNO.NEXTVAL, P.* FROM(
SELECT #{plan.refPno} AS REF_PNO, #{plan.planOrder} AS PLAN_ORDER, #{plan.placeName} AS PLACE_NAME, #{plan.placeAddress} AS PLACE_ADDRESS, #{plan.xCoordinate} AS X_COORDINATE, #{plan.yCoordinate} AS Y_COORDINATE, to_date(#{plan.tripDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRIP_DATE, #{plan.memo} AS MEMO
FROM dual
) P
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLANNER WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT PLANNER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, PLANNER_TITLE, W_DATE, AREA, TYPE, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM PLANNER P JOIN MEMBER ON(PLANNER_WRITER = USER_ID) WHERE P.STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY PLANNER_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PLANNER SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE PLANNER_NO = #{pno}
mapper.select: SELECT PLANNER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, PLANNER_TITLE, F_DATE, L_DATE, W_DATE, AREA, TYPE, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM PLANNER P JOIN MEMBER ON(PLANNER_WRITER = USER_ID) WHERE P.STATUS ='Y' AND PLANNER_NO = #{pno}
SELECT PLAN_ORDER, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_ADDRESS, X_COORDINATE, Y_COORDINATE, TRIP_DATE, MEMO FROM PLAN WHERE REF_PNO = #{pno} ORDER BY PLAN_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKEPLANNER(LIKE_NO, USER_ID, PLANNER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_LNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, ${plannerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT PLANNER_NO FROM LIKEPLANNER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKEPLANNER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PLANNER_NO = #{plannerNo}
